ticket.title: Send CI failure/fixed notifications to Core Mailing List
ticket.original-body:
So we can avoid the "everything's broken and nobody knows" problem that we had during the BugMash.
If things go haywire and start spamming the core list, you can edit ci/cruise_config.rb to send only to me again (instructions included in file).
